name: Remember (Jordan Dube)
description:
Someone is asking you what you know about home.

Gameplay:

Headphones recommended.
Click and drag the answers that appear to the chat box at the bottom.
To quit, click "X" at the top left.
To restart, click "R" at the top left.

Developers: 
Code & Visuals: Josh Jacobs (Stumphead Games)
Code/Audio/Visuals: Jordan Dube (Gravity Hand)
